otherNames: Wuxian Tuiyan, Dedução Infinita, Infinite Deduction, Infinite Derivation, Wúxiàn Tuīyǎn, 予知能力でSSS級最強ハンターへ, 无限推演, 無限推演
synopsis: Horror games are combined with reality. Zhang Xiaobai, a good-for-nothing social animal, has gained a golden finger that can predict the next ten minutes and the ability to raise weird monsters. He will fight wits and courage, fight monsters, and fight humanity to grow.
